name: FNF | Don't Get Spooked!
description:
Official HTML5 Port for the FNF Don't Get Spooked mod!

Get a glimpse into Boo's undead life, Aka some random ghost. Though a different perspective explore an entire side story of ghost and ghouls. (Literally lol)
 Have a treat and don't fall for any tricks! 🍬

Mega thanks to ninjamuffin99, PhantomArcade , evilsk8r, and kawaisprite for making the OG game open sourced! 

Play it here: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/770371
